sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Image, Item } from 'semantic-ui-react'

const ContentItem = () => (
  <Item.Group style={{marginTop:100}}>
    <Item>
      <Item.Image style={{width:500}}  src={require("assets/img/c1.jpeg").default}/>
   
      <Item.Content>
        <Item.Header style={{fontWeight:'bold',fontSize:50}} as='a'>HIZLI İLERLEME KAYDET</Item.Header>
        <Item.Meta style={{width:480}}> Araştırma, kurslarımızın okuma, dinleme ve konuşma becerilerini etkili ve verimli bir şekilde verdiğini gösteriyor. </Item.Meta>
        <Item.Description>
      

        </Item.Description>
        <Item.Extra>Additional Details</Item.Extra>
      </Item.Content>
    </Item>

    <Item>
      <Item.Image size='tiny' src='https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/wireframe/image.png' />

      <Item.Content>
        <Item.Header as='a'>Header</Item.Header>
        <Item.Meta>Description</Item.Meta>
        <Item.Description>
         djncsjdnjsdncjsdncjdscndjcjsnd
        </Item.Description>
        <Item.Extra>Additional Details</Item.Extra>
      </Item.Content>
    </Item>
  </Item.Group>
)

export default ContentItem
